fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Analyze information about the authorized player(s) tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of the night, you will receive information about the authorized player(s) based on how many players are authorized.
> 1: Sheriff (948) check
> 2: You will discover which one of them have the higher post number
> 3: You will be told who the authorized targets visit, but you will not be told which authorized target visited each individual target.
> 4+: You will be told how many authorized players are Sentries.
